name: Suction Fire (2021)
description:
Suction Fire was developed in 2021 as game idea prototype.

It is a 2D single-player arcade-style shooter that uses the core mechanic of using your enemies as your ammo.

The player plays a little character that has two firing modes. The first being a suction mode where the player can suck in smaller enemies and store them as ammo. The player can then fire back the smaller enemies at larger enemies to destroy them. The player instantly dies if they touch an enemy object or enemy projectile.  

The player's goal is to navigate through the level and reach the exit. 

The game keeps track of the player's time to complete the level. The fastest time to complete the level is recorded and saved on the menu screen.

Controls:
A, D - Move left/right
Spacebar - Jump
Left Mouse Click - Shoot
Right Mouse Click - Suck In Enemies
